channel.title: Drop percentage? and items/ npcdrops
channel.description: so i think im coding a pi. im having a problem when it comes to npc drops. it will show like 1 995 in the server folder/data/config/npcdrops. but doesnt give me how many i want to drop and the percentage rate? any idea on how to control that??

item.title: Drop percentage? and items/ npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

Spencer4678:

I think for drop rarity the closer it is to 0 the higher the chances. That’s how it works for me on my PI.

oh snap lol that just threw me off i tried it with 100 and it drops 1m cash everytime so prob not on this one
but thanks. if i get a diff server and it doesnt work, ill keep that in mind

Read full topic

item.title: Drop percentage? and items/ npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

ok so i think im gettign the hang of it. so just regular items for 3a. -1st row. and rarer items for 3b- bottom row?

so like
#man
(npc id) : (Rarity) -tab- 3a
1:5 (item id) : (quantity) (item id) : (quantity) – and this row for all drops 5% right?
3b–rares (item id) : (quantity) <-- this row for rarer drops or something? im confused

Read full topic

item.title: Drop percentage? and items/ npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

this should help…

#0 1 : 2 3a : 4 3a : 4 3a : 4 3b : 4 3b : 4 3b : 4 3b : 4

#0 = Note (note needed but you can put as the npc’s name
1 = npc
2 = drop rarity (%/100)
3a = a random drop (percents by 3a / total 3a’s)
3b = rarer drop (percents by 3b / total 3b)
4 = amount of item to drop

Read full topic

item.title: Drop percentage? and items/ npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:396420”][quote author=play 4 fun link=topic=493589.msg3608777#msg3608777 date=1306362359]
haha thanks, what ive been stuck on for a while you just solved in 10seconds i appreciate it. i didnt even know i had wordpad. ok, just wanna figure this out though.
#Man drops
1:1 995:100 554:100

(npc id): (?) (item id): (amount)

but wheres percent rate that it will drop. like on delta you do like
(npc id) (item id) (quantity) (percentage/drop rate)
[/quote]the second number it goes

npcid:rarity tab itemid:amountofitemid[/quote]

so if i wanted a man (1) to drop 1m cash?all the time. i would go
1:100 (tab) 995:1000000 ???

Read full topic
